inclusion.criterion: Children with Down syndrome aged 2-17 years who are seen through the Down syndrome clinic at Oregon Health and Science University
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at Oregon Health and Science University who either have a recently completed sleep study (within the past 6 months and no surgical treatment for OSA since then) or who will be having a sleep study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of subglottic or tracheal stenosis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe cardiopulmonary disease requiring supplemental oxygen
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Parents or caregivers who are unable to read written English or Spanish
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and O2 sats 70s on BipAp with 5L.
